This package provides a set of tools and functionalities to use and interact with [FOBI (Food-Biomarker Ontology)](https://github.com/pcastellanoescuder/FoodBiomarkerOntology).   

# Installation

```{r, eval = F}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("pcastellanoescuder/fobitools")
```
